Author: ambientfoods
Text: thank you tofu snob i was spiraling this morning after i read a comment on an old post about how people can 'metabolize artificial sugar as regular sugar' and then i read a lot of terrifying studies done on rats ahhhhh ok im exhaling now (forgetting to breathe that's gotta add a pound right there)

Author: tofu_snob
Text: I would attribute the weight fluctuation to fluid more-so than artificial sweeteners. Disordered eating can cause fluid and electrolyte fluctuations, and certain sugar alcohols may impact your gut motility.
